text: Jitanyong teuntang buleun bak gata Pakon phon nyata ubit that leupah â€˜Oh Iheuh nyan rayeok teuma ka nyata Tajaweub sigra hikeumat Allah Mangat jeut watee keu manusia Miseu jih masa jak u Baitullah Soe nyang ek haji ka meujan watee Teuma beu tateupue buet nyang jroh leupah Tamong rumoh gop bek jak rot likot Nyan hana patot ka roh buet salah Tapi nyang patot pubuet takwa U rumoh tangga rot keue talangkah Tamong rot pinto ngon tatakwa Gata bahgia Neubri le Allah
